Text.Name: PolicyStory_TreeEXP
Text.Desc: You have learned enough from the Creed of Heaven, and your gains can be congealed into a pill now.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give1
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and distributed food to the passersby.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give2
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. There were many a beggar asking for money on the side of the road.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give3
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw a stone bridge had collapsed, and people no longer walk through here.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give4
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw two villagers arguing over a dog.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give5
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw two young gentlemen were fighting over a woman.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give6
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw two big men fighting each other. A passerby explained that it was because one man planted a tree, but the other man picked and ate its fruits.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give7
Text.Desc: [NAME] was preparing to do charity work, when a woman exquisitely dressed approached the agent's place crying, and said her child had gone missing.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give8
Text.Desc: [NAME] was preparing to do charity work, when a man rushed into the hall begging the agent to save his dying wife.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give9
Text.Desc: [NAME] had wandered to a rather distant place and started giving alms. A group of bandits happened to be passing by.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give10
Text.Desc: Agent [NAME] came across the forces of {0}, and saw that they were giving alms to passersby.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give11
Text.Desc: Agent [NAME] came across the forces of {0}, and saw that they were preaching.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give12
Text.Desc: Agent [NAME] came across the forces of {0}, and saw that they were holding a fasting ceremony.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give13
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They came across a broken wooden house, its owner is handicapped and unable to repair it.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give14
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw a man wearing foreign costume swindling passersby.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give15
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They passed by two taverns facing each other on opposite sides of the road, of which the waiters were arguing over business issues.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give16
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They encountered a group of refugees.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give17
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw a dying man who was severely ill on the side of the road, who pleaded to the agent to put him out of his misery.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Give18
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They accidentally touched an old man in the crowd, who immediately fell onto the ground and started shouting, "Ouch! Somebody broke my leg! This is the one! "

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Product1
Text.Desc: It was a fine day. [NAME] decided to supervise labor.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_TreasureHunt
Text.Desc: [NAME] made a divination and decided to take his disciples on a treasure hunt.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Sermon1
Text.Desc: Today, [NAME] was standing on the side of the road near their place and preparing to preach.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Sermon2
Text.Desc: Today, [NAME] was preaching when someone came up to them and shouted: "A load of nonsense! "

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Sermon3
Text.Desc: Today, [NAME] was preaching when a scholar came up to them and said whatever the agent said was wrong.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Sermon4
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] was preaching. A middle-aged woman kept clapping in an obnoxious way, but she is not a follower.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Secret1
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] walked into the secret pavilion to hatch a plot.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Secret2
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered that {0} was giving alms and decided to interfere.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Secret3
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered that {0} was preparing to preach...an idea came to mind like a bolt of lightning.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Secret4
Text.Desc: [NAME] found out that {0} was holding a fasting ceremony. The agent decided to interfere with it.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Disp1
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] was in the Discipline Temple preparing for an Abstinence.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Disp2
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that people were all living a lavish lifestyle and decided to perform an Abstinence.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Disp3
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that rich people were living lavishly while the poor die on the side of the road, and decided to perform an Abstinence.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Disp4
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that outlaws were running the town and hatred filled the city, and decided to perform an Abstinence.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Disp5
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that dishonest merchants and robbers were running the town, and decided to perform an Abstinence.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_OtherDisp1
Text.Desc: Today, [NAME] saw that [SCHOOL{0}] was having an Abstinence.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Drought
Text.Desc: [NAME] decided to deal with the drought.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Flood
Text.Desc: [NAME] decided to deal with the flood.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_Siberia
Text.Desc: [NAME] decided to deal with the cold wave.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_EarthQuake
Text.Desc: [NAME] decided to deal with the earthquake.

Text.Name: PolicyStory_God1
Text.Desc: [NAME] decided to let a Shendao disciple perform a miracle.
